game.title: The Lost Treasure of El Dorado
game.objective: Find the legendary city of gold, El Dorado.
game.description: Rumor has it that a great treasure lies hidden deep in the heart of the Amazon rainforest. It's said to be a city paved with gold, and many brave adventurers have sought its riches over the centuries...

task.objective: Find the location of El Dorado on a map.
task.description: The map to El Dorado is rumored to be hidden in an ancient Mayan temple deep in the jungle.

task.objective: Gather a team of skilled adventurers.
task.description: Assembling a team of experts is crucial for any successful expedition into the unknown...
The journey into the heart of the Amazon jungle will be long and treacherous...
